home.description: Forsa is a non-profit Moroccan association dedicated to creating opportunities for underserved communities through education, skill development, and community engagement.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that everyone deserves equal opportunities to thrive. Our mission is to bridge gaps in access to education, healthcare, and economic opportunities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A Morocco where every individual has the resources and support needed to achieve their full potential and contribute to society.

callToAction.title: Ready to make a difference?
callToAction.description: Join our community of changemakers and help us create more opportunities for those who need them most.

activities.title: Our Activities
activities.subtitle: Discover how we're making a difference
activities.noActivities: No activities found in this category.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Want to participate in our activities or organize one in your community?

schoolSupplies.title: School Supplies Distribution
schoolSupplies.description: Providing essential school supplies to underprivileged children to support their education journey.

healthWorkshop.title: Community Health Workshop
healthWorkshop.description: Educating communities about preventive healthcare measures and healthy living practices.

treePlanting.title: Tree Planting Initiative
treePlanting.description: Combating climate change by planting trees and promoting environmental awareness.

guidanceSessions.title: Academic and Career Guidance Sessions
guidanceSessions.description: Organizing orientation sessions to help high school students make informed academic and career choices.
guidanceSessions.detailedDescription:
Forsa Association for Socio-Educational and Sports Development in Trougout inaugurates its activities with a guidance seminar for students of Trougout Qualifying High School entitled {Trougout Graduates Return Carrying Their Experiences for the Next Generation to Invest}.

In the context of the emergence of Forsa Association as a new civil society actor in the Trougout region and its surroundings, the association inaugurated its activities on 20/05/2025 with a guidance seminar under the slogan 'From Trougout to the Future' in partnership with the administration of Trougout Qualifying High School.

The seminar program included:
> Student reception.
> Speech by the Association President.
> Speech by the Institution Principal.
> Speech by the School Life Coordinator.
> Introduction of guests.
> Guest presentations:

• **Mohamed Afkir** - National School of Applied Sciences in Al Hoceima/Data Engineering.

• **Abubakar Bourbain** - Multidisciplinary Faculty in Nador/Public Law Department.

• **Mohamed Baouch** - Faculty of Sciences and Technologies Al Hoceima, PhD in Environmental Chemistry and Water Treatment.

• **Professor Moussa Afrmas** - Sociology and Philosophy prospects after Baccalaureate.

> Cultural competition workshop.
> Motivation and stress management workshop.
> Workshop 'Share your Baccalaureate experience' with institution teachers' participation.
> Closing remarks by Association President **Jamal Baqdour**.

This program was accompanied by a distinctive educational atmosphere and high interactive spirit from both facilitators and attendees, teachers and students, which energized the association's executive board and leadership to move forward with more strength and activity in the coming days, aiming to elevate civil society work and civic presence in the region to make it an exemplary model and a beacon to be emulated.

donate.title: Support Our Cause
donate.subtitle: Your contribution makes a difference
donate.description: Your donation helps us continue our mission of creating opportunities for all. Every contribution, regardless of size, has a meaningful impact on the communities we serve.

bankTransfer.title: Bank Transfer Details
bankTransfer.description: You can support our mission by making a direct bank transfer using the details below. Simply visit your bank agency or use online banking to send your donation.
bankTransfer.noteText: Please include "Donation - Your Name" in the transfer reference to help us track your contribution. You can also send us an email at contact@forsa-association.org to notify us of your donation.

impact.title: Your Impact
impact.small: Provides educational materials for one student for a month
impact.medium: Sponsors vocational training for one individual
impact.description: Your generous contribution will help us continue our mission to create opportunities for the community. We believe in transparency and accountability, and we ensure that your donation is used effectively to create positive change.

callToAction.title: Every Contribution Matters
callToAction.description: Whether big or small, your donation makes a difference in someone's life. Join us in creating a better future for all.

collaborations.title: Our Partners & Collaborators
collaborations.subtitle: Together we achieve more
collaborations.description: We collaborate with various organizations, businesses, and institutions to maximize our impact and reach. Our partnerships are built on shared values and a common vision for a better future.

callToAction.title: Ready to Make a Difference Together?
callToAction.description: Join our network of partners and help us create more opportunities for communities in need.
